song_lyrics: Amne pyāru pyāru lāge Pramukh Swāmī keru nām,
Pramukh Swāmī keru nām, jīvane ṭharvānu chhe ṭhām...
Sahuthī sāru nām chhe nyāru, ujjvaḷ jīvan ne karnāru,
Pāme chanchaḷ man vishrām, Pramukh Swāmī keru nām... 1
Nishdin bhāv dharī sambhāru, antarthī nā ghaḍīe visāru,
Thāye jīvan pūraṇkām, Pramukh Swāmī keru nām... 2
Sarve sthiti sarva kriyāmā, hardam hete dharu haiyāmā,
Dilmā shubh guṇ vase tamām, Pramukh Swāmī keru nām... 3
Pragaṭ maḷiyā Pramukh Swāmī, kahe Vanmāḷī bhāngī khāmī,
Karīye koṭi koṭi praṇām, Pramukh Swāmī keru nām... 4
title: Amne pyāru pyāru lāge Pramukh Swāmī keru nām

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1025: Vanmalidas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
